mapper.sql: transfer_head_id, transfer_no, transfer_type, outbound_wid, storage_wid, plan_time, outbound_status, storage_status, `status`, create_time, dr
mapper.insert: insert into em_transfer_head (transfer_head_id, transfer_no, transfer_type, outbound_wid, storage_wid, plan_time, outbound_status, storage_status, `status`, create_time, dr) values (#{transferHeadId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{transferNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{transferType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{outboundWid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{storageWid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{planTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{outboundStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{storageStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dr,jdbcType=TINYINT})

mapper.update:
update em_transfer_head
transfer_no = #{transferNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
transfer_type = #{transferType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
outbound_wid = #{outboundWid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
storage_wid = #{storageWid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
plan_time = #{planTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
outbound_status = #{outboundStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
storage_status = #{storageStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
`status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
dr = #{dr,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where transfer_head_id = #{transferHeadId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update em_transfer_head set transfer_no = #{transferNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, transfer_type = #{transferType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, outbound_wid = #{outboundWid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, storage_wid = #{storageWid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, plan_time = #{planTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, outbound_status = #{outboundStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, storage_status = #{storageStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, dr = #{dr,jdbcType=TINYINT} where transfer_head_id = #{transferHeadId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select th.transfer_head_id as transferHeadId,th.transfer_no as transferNo,th.transfer_type as transferType from sm_storage s left join em_transfer_head th on s.source_no = th.transfer_no where s.dr = 1 and s.storage_id = #{storageId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
